Class RecipientLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • RecipientLine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecipientLineInterface

    public class RecipientLine
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecipientLineInterface
    RecipientLine class contains a queue of Recipients and simulates queuing and dequeuing Recipients to and from the recipients’ line.
    Author:
    Alex Juan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private QueueInterface<Recipient> rQueue 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RecipientLine()
      Make the internal queue a default size
      RecipientLine(int size)
      Makes the internal queue the size dependent on the parameter

      boolean recipientLineEmpty()
      check if Recipient queue line is empty
      Recipient recipientTurn()
      When it is the recipient turn, recipient will be dequeued from the recipient line

      • addNewRecepient

        public boolean addNewRecepient(Recipient rc)
                        throws RecipientException
        Enqueue a new Recipient to the queue of the Recipients in the Recipient line
        Specified by:
        addNewRecepient in interface RecipientLineInterface
        Parameters:
        rc - a Recipient
        Returns:
        return true if recipient is queued successfully
        Throws:
        RecipientException - throws RecipientException("The Recipient Queue is Full") if queue is full

      • recipientTurn

        public Recipient recipientTurn()
                        throws RecipientException
        When it is the recipient turn, recipient will be dequeued from the recipient line
        Specified by:
        recipientTurn in interface RecipientLineInterface
        Returns:
        a Recipient object
        Throws:
        RecipientException - throws RecipientException("The Recipient Queue is empty") if there is no Recipient in the line

      • recipientLineEmpty

        public boolean recipientLineEmpty()
        check if Recipient queue line is empty
        Specified by:
